title: Logo: Contemporary Arts Center New Orleans
content:
I’m stumped, but I know this will be easy for someone here. Is it Century Gothic?

[http://www.cacno.org/images\_design/new-caclogo-noborder.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080915165206/http:/www.cacno.org/images_design/new-caclogo-noborder.gif)

 [‹ Tea Canister Serif Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080915165206/http:/typophile.com/node/49373 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) fonts in 'Psycho' movie poster - Compacta, Titling Gothic {Lex, Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080915165206/http:/typophile.com/node/29331 "Go to next forum topic")
author: casinnola

comments.content:
It looks like Avant Garde, the typeface that Century Gothic copied.

- Lex
